dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5161 IH: Protecting Hunting and Archery in Schools Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Tenney (for herself, Mr. Banks, Mr. Fulcher, and Mr. Babin) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 with respect to prohibited uses of funds under such Act, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protecting Hunting and Archery in Schools Act of 2023.
Section 8526 of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 7906) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in paragraph (5), by adding or at the end;
in paragraph (6), by striking ; or at the end and inserting a period; and
